channel.title: Need Help With Barrows Minigame
channel.description:
So I was following this tutorial when it got deleted... So I need some help. I followed to exactly but when I compile I get this. 100 ERRORS!!!?!?!!??
[img]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p43/tarheeldude7/Error.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need Help With Barrows Minigame
item.dc:creator: @Rshacker112 Rshacker112
item.description:
@Rshacker112 wrote:

But where do I put it? And what’s a void? I’m forgetting this stuff again…I learned what a void was yesterday and how to use them and now I forgot.
How do I know where to put the bracket?

EDIT: Here’s what in my NPC handler folder for the minigame

[code] npcs[i].animNumber = 0x08D; //rat dead

					} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2026){ //Barrows Dharok
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900;
						client.barrowskillcount++;
						client.dharok = true;
					} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2025){ //Barrows Ahrim
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900;
						client.barrowskillcount++;
						client.ahrim = true;
					} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2027){ //Barrows Guthan
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900;
						client.barrowskillcount++;
						client.guthan = true;
					} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2028){ //Barrows Karil
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900;
						client.barrowskillcount++;
						client.karil = true;
					} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2029){ //Barrows Torag
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900;
						client.barrowskillcount++;
						client.torag = true;
					} else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2030){ //Barrows Verac
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900;
						client.barrowskillcount++;
						client.verac = true;
					}  else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2036){ //Barrows Skeletons
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900;
						client.barrowskillcount++;
					}
					}[/code]

The rat dead is part of the code above it[br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2007, 04:29:35 PM[/size][hr]Help me please!!![br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2007, 05:37:42 PM[/size][hr]HELP ME!!!
